sets.description: After using any flame weapon skill or discharge skill, increase all ATK by **18%/22%/26%/30%** for **30** seconds. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

When equipped with at least 1 flame weapon, increase all elemental damage by **28%/32%/36%/40%**. When generating a Colorful Illusion, increase final damage by an additional **20%** for **25** seconds. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
